line_2: How! quoth the Lord of soaring Fowls,
Were then your Progeny but Owls?

line_1: And loud and long the dog of midnight howls! —
line_2: Shrill scream the famish'd bats, and shivering owls,

line_1: Unmov'd whilst malice barks, or envy howls,
line_2: Walks firm to virtue through the scoffs of fools;
